item.description:
This will be the first meetup of the new year, and a time for us to get reacquainted and set some goals for future meetups! We will have a nice, quiet space, in contrast to our previous location. I will hunt up some of my materials for people's perusal as well.

NOTE-- I edited the time. 7 PM is pretty late to start something on a Sunday evening. My bad--it's the default start time.
item.name: A start for the new year.
